## Quarto

This Quarto website is hosted with [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/). Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Adding blogs

To add blogs to this Quarto website, just place your html files within the docs/ folder. I need to test this.
